bibl.title: Callimachus in the Tax Rolls.
bibl.note: The informal treatment given to lessee's names in the tax lists, and the occurrence of Greek translations of Egyptian names. The poetic translation "Andiktes" derives from Callimachus (Aitia fr. 177 Pf.)

bibl.title: Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Youtie Herbert C., Callimachus in the Tax Rolls.
Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology (Toronto, 1970) pp. 545-551.

The informal treatment given to lessee's names in the tax lists, and the occurrence of Greek translations of Egyptian names. The poetic translation "Andiktes" derives from Callimachus (Aitia fr. 177 Pf.)
